segment.source: What's New in UE-V 2.1 SP1
segment.target: What's New in UE-V 2.1 SP1

segment.source: What's New in UE-V 2.1 SP1
segment.target: What's New in UE-V 2.1 SP1

segment.source: What's New in UE-V 2.1 SP1
segment.target: What's New in UE-V 2.1 SP1

segment.source: User Experience Virtualization 2.1 SP1 provides these new features and functionality compared to UE-V 2.1.
segment.target: User Experience Virtualization 2.1 SP1 provides these new features and functionality compared to UE-V 2.1.

segment.source: The Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.1 SP1 Release Notes provide more information about the UE-V 2.1 SP1 release.
segment.target: The Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.1 SP1 Release Notes provide more information about the UE-V 2.1 SP1 release.

segment.source: Support for Windows 10
segment.target: Support for Windows 10

segment.source: UE-V 2.1 SP1 adds support for Windows 10, in addition to the same software that is supported in earlier versions of UE-V.
segment.target: UE-V 2.1 SP1 adds support for Windows 10, in addition to the same software that is supported in earlier versions of UE-V.

segment.source: Compatibility with Microsoft Azure
segment.target: Compatibility with Microsoft Azure

segment.source: Windows 10 lets enterprise users synchronize Windows app settings and Windows operating system settings to Azure instead of to OneDrive.
segment.target: Windows 10 lets enterprise users synchronize Windows app settings and Windows operating system settings to Azure instead of to OneDrive.

segment.source: You can use the Windows 10 enterprise sync functionality together with UE-V on on-premises domain-joined computers only.
segment.target: You can use the Windows 10 enterprise sync functionality together with UE-V on on-premises domain-joined computers only.

segment.source: To enable coexistence between Windows 10 and UE-V, you must disable the following UE-V templates using either PowerShell on each client or Group Policy.
segment.target: To enable coexistence between Windows 10 and UE-V, you must disable the following UE-V templates using either PowerShell on each client or Group Policy.

segment.source: In Group Policy, under the Microsoft User Experience Virtualization node, configure these policy settings:
segment.target: In Group Policy, under the Microsoft User Experience Virtualization node, configure these policy settings:

segment.source: Enable “Do Not Synchronize Windows Apps”
segment.target: Enable “Do Not Synchronize Windows Apps”

segment.source: Disable “Sync Windows Settings”
segment.target: Disable “Sync Windows Settings”

segment.source: Settings Synchronization Behavior Changed for Windows 10 Support
segment.target: Settings Synchronization Behavior Changed for Windows 10 Support

segment.source: UE-V 2.1 SP1 roams taskbar settings between Windows 10 devices.
segment.target: UE-V 2.1 SP1 roams taskbar settings between Windows 10 devices.

segment.source: However, UE-V does not synchronize taskbar settings between Windows 10 devices and devices running previous operating systems.
segment.target: However, UE-V does not synchronize taskbar settings between Windows 10 devices and devices running previous operating systems.

segment.source: In addition, UE-V 2.1 SP1 does not synchronize settings between the Microsoft Calculator in Windows 10 and the Microsoft Calculator in previous operating systems.
segment.target: In addition, UE-V 2.1 SP1 does not synchronize settings between the Microsoft Calculator in Windows 10 and the Microsoft Calculator in previous operating systems.

segment.source: Support Added for Roaming Network Printers
segment.target: Support Added for Roaming Network Printers

segment.source: UE-V 2.1 SP1 lets network printers roam between devices so that a user has access to their network printers when logged on to any device on the network.
segment.target: UE-V 2.1 SP1 lets network printers roam between devices so that a user has access to their network printers when logged on to any device on the network.

segment.source: This includes roaming the printer that they set as the default.
segment.target: This includes roaming the printer that they set as the default.

segment.source: Printer roaming in UE-V requires one of these scenarios:
segment.target: Printer roaming in UE-V requires one of these scenarios:

segment.source: The print server can download the required driver when it roams to a new device.
segment.target: The print server can download the required driver when it roams to a new device.

segment.source: The driver for the roaming network printer is pre-installed on any device that needs to access that network printer.
segment.target: The driver for the roaming network printer is pre-installed on any device that needs to access that network printer.

segment.source: The printer driver can be obtained from Windows Update.
segment.target: The printer driver can be obtained from Windows Update.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The UE-V printer roaming feature does not roam printer settings or preferences, such as printing double-sided.
segment.target: The UE-V printer roaming feature does not roam printer settings or preferences, such as printing double-sided.

segment.source: Office 2013 Settings Location Template
segment.target: Office 2013 Settings Location Template

segment.source: UE-V 2.1 and 2.1 SP1 include the Microsoft Office 2013 settings location template with improved Outlook signature support.
segment.target: UE-V 2.1 and 2.1 SP1 include the Microsoft Office 2013 settings location template with improved Outlook signature support.

segment.source: We’ve added synchronization of default signature settings for new, reply, and forwarded emails.
segment.target: We’ve added synchronization of default signature settings for new, reply, and forwarded emails.

segment.source: Customers no longer have to choose the default signature settings.
segment.target: Customers no longer have to choose the default signature settings.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: An Outlook profile must be created for any device on which a user wants to sync their Outlook signature.
segment.target: An Outlook profile must be created for any device on which a user wants to sync their Outlook signature.

segment.source: If the profile is not already created, the user can create one and then restart Outlook on that device to enable signature synchronization.
segment.target: If the profile is not already created, the user can create one and then restart Outlook on that device to enable signature synchronization.

segment.source: Previously UE-V included Microsoft Office 2010 settings location templates that were automatically distributed and registered with the UE-V Agent.
segment.target: Previously UE-V included Microsoft Office 2010 settings location templates that were automatically distributed and registered with the UE-V Agent.

segment.source: UE-V 2.1 works with Office 365 to determine whether Office 2013 settings are roamed by Office 365.
segment.target: UE-V 2.1 works with Office 365 to determine whether Office 2013 settings are roamed by Office 365.

segment.source: If settings are roamed by Office 365 they are not roamed by UE-V.
segment.target: If settings are roamed by Office 365 they are not roamed by UE-V.

segment.source: Overview of user and roaming settings for Office 2013 provides more information.
segment.target: Overview of user and roaming settings for Office 2013 provides more information.

segment.source: To enable settings synchronization using UE-V 2.1, do one of the following:
segment.target: To enable settings synchronization using UE-V 2.1, do one of the following:

segment.source: Use Group Policy to disable Office 365 synchronization
segment.target: Use Group Policy to disable Office 365 synchronization

segment.source: Do not enable the Office 365 synchronization experience during Office 2013 installation
segment.target: Do not enable the Office 365 synchronization experience during Office 2013 installation

segment.source: UE-V 2.1 ships Office 2013 and Office 2010 templates.
segment.target: UE-V 2.1 ships Office 2013 and Office 2010 templates.

segment.source: This release removes the Office 2007 templates.
segment.target: This release removes the Office 2007 templates.

segment.source: Users can still use Office 2007 templates from UE-V 2.0 or earlier and can still get the templates from the UE-V template gallery located here.
segment.target: Users can still use Office 2007 templates from UE-V 2.0 or earlier and can still get the templates from the UE-V template gallery located here.

segment.source: Got a suggestion for UE-V?
segment.target: Got a suggestion for UE-V?

segment.source: Add or vote on suggestions here.
segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.

segment.source: For UE-V issues, use the UE-V TechNet Forum.
segment.target: For UE-V issues, use the UE-V TechNet Forum.
